unnormalised: Employee retention is crucial in today's competitive job market, especially post-Diwali. We've seen a spike in attrition lately. Focusing on career growth, like offering skill-upgrading courses at IIT Delhi, is key. Regular performance reviews, say, on 26/01/2024, and fair compensation (considering Mumbai's high cost of living) are vital. Let's also revisit our benefits package by 10/11/2023 at 14:00 hrs. Happy employees stay! Perhaps a team lunch on 02/10/2023?
normalised: Employee retention is crucial in today's competitive job market, especially post-Diwali. We've seen a spike in attrition lately. Focusing on career growth, like offering skill-upgrading courses at I I T Delhi, is key. Regular performance reviews, say, on twenty-sixth january two thousand and twenty four, and fair compensation (considering Mumbai's high cost of living) are vital. Let's also revisit our benefits package by tenth november two thousand and twenty three at fourteen hundred hours. Happy employees stay! Perhaps a team lunch on second october two thousand and twenty three?
